title: A State of Trance Yearmix 2013 - UNMIXED
description:
In this package are the unmixed, extended versions of the tracks included in the A State of Trance Yearmix 2013 mixed by Armin van Buuren.
Please note, this is NOT the yearmix itself, merely the tracks of the mix in an unmixed format!

Also included are some bonus tracks collected by me which were shamefully absent in the yearmix. Ah well you can't have all :(

Will Atkinson - Deep Impact (we seem to be approaching an age of the gross)



Special thanks to:

Inspiron for uploading the ASOT episodes each week and providing us with his show
Some illegal Russian sites which enabled me to download all the tracks for free
And of course Armin himself for providing us with this amazing show for over 10 years
